item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Backstreet Boys - Homecoming: Live from Orlando [Unc. FLAC]
item.description:
​

Homecoming: Live from Orlando is the home release of a concert performance from the Backstreet Boys.

The show, filmed during the final stop of the Backstreet's Back tour on December 31, 1999, initially aired as a pay-per-view special. It was released on VHS in mid-1999 and DVD in early 2000. Interestingly, only one song performed at the concert, "I Need You Tonight (Heaven In Your Eyes)," would appear on the group's follow-up album, Millennium, albeit with alternate lyrics.

Audio taken from the official DVD.

1. That's the Way I Like It
2. Hey Mr. D.J. (Keep Playin' This Song)
3. Just to Be Close to You (Acapella)
4. My Heart Stays With You (Howie Dorough solo)
5. Lay Down Beside Me (A.J. McLean solo)
6. Nobody But You (Kevin Richardson solo)
7. That's What She Said (Brian Littrell solo)
8. I Need You Tonight (Heaven In Your Eyes) [Nick Carter solo]
9. Let's Have A Party
10. Quit Playing Games (With My Heart)
11. All I Have to Give
12. Anywhere for You
13. I'll Never Break Your Heart
14. As Long as You Love Me
15. Get Down (You're the One for Me)
16. We've Got It Goin' On
17. Everybody (Backstreet's Back)

item.author: JayFantasi
